content.1: And he said unto me, Son of man, stand upon thy feet, and I will speak unto thee.
content.2: And the spirit entered into me when he spake unto me, and set me upon my feet, that I heard him that spake unto me.
content.3: And he said unto me, Son of man, I send thee to the children of Israel, to a rebellious nation that hath rebelled against me: they and their fathers have transgressed against me,
content.5: And they, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear, (for they
content.6: And thou, son of man, be not afraid of them, neither be afraid of their words, though briers and thorns
content.7: And thou shalt speak my words unto them, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear: for they
content.8: But thou, son of man, hear what I say unto thee; Be not thou rebellious like that rebellious house: open thy mouth, and eat that I give thee.
content.9: And when I looked, behold, an hand
content.10: And he spread it before me; and it
